38 //
39 // Base class for uncopyable classes.
40 //
42 
43 #ifndef FASTRACK_UTILS_UNCOPYABLE_H
44 #define FASTRACK_UTILS_UNCOPYABLE_H
45 
46 namespace fastrack {
47 
48 class Uncopyable {
49 protected:
50  Uncopyable() {}
51  virtual ~Uncopyable() {}
52 
53 private:
54  // Declare (but do not define) copy constructor and copy-assign operator
55  // so that child classes are not copyable.
56  Uncopyable(const Uncopyable& other);
57  Uncopyable& operator=(const Uncopyable& other);
58 }; //\class Uncopyable
59 
60 } //\namespace fastrack
61 
62 #endif

Uncopyable & operator=(const Uncopyable &other)
